THUE.TODAY | 076.7543.789 
DINOSAUR 
WORK EXPERIENCES: 
CO-FOUNDER / DIGITAL MARKETING MANAGER AT 
THUE.TODAY 
(August 2017 – Now) 
Thue.today is startup company with the most automated, thus most cost 
effective recruitment website in Vietnam. Thue.today is designed to provide a 
job everyone regardless of their skills, educational background or geographical 
location. Thue.today focuses on Hospitality, F&B and Retail industries.  
• 
Website: https://thue.today/ 
• 
Introduce: https://bit.ly/2CVemfP 
Top brand on thue.today: Rico Taco, Progapanda, the Loft, Tuk Tuk, 
Morico, Pasteurs Street, East West Brewing, El Gaucho, L’Usine, Gõ 
Thainoodle, La Vanille Paris, Dosh, YummyQ... 
• 
Creating and being full responsible marketing strategy (online, 
offline) to acquire user and get more profitable company 
• 
Create strategies to build brand awareness with Employer and 
Candidate by online, offline activities. 
• 
Track conversion rates and making improvements to the website. 
• 
Improve the usability, UX/UIdesign, content and conversion of the 
company website, app 
• 
Evaluate customer research, market conditions and competitor 
data. 
• 
Managing and developing relationship with partners, clients, 
investors. 
• 
Building business plan, business model to operate company and 
call for investment 
• 
Analyzing data to improve UI, UX website and increase more user 
account by SEO, Facebook Ads, SEM, GDN, DSP, Online 
advertising, Email marketing. 
• 
Completing automation system for reducing staff with highest 
results. 
• 
Recruiting, training and developing a team of management of 
staff to achieve target and operation profits. 
Achievement: 
• 
67% increase of revenue 
• 
178% increase of candidate 
• 
77% increase of employer 
• 
43% increase of job posting 
• 
Top 60 of Startup Wheel (1500 startups joining), Get sponsor from 
Shinhan Future’s Lab (under Shinhan Bank). 
SUMESH PERINGETH – CEO OF DINOSAUR 
| 0903.309.540 
IDM VIETNAM 
NGUYEN THANH THANH – HEAD OF WEB STRATEGY 
| 0932.472.077 
NGUYEN HONG PHUC – HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGER | 
0937.362.458 
INTERESTS 
Technology, Startup, Streetlife Photography, 
Collector: Camera, Cellphone, Megazord... 
MARKETING MANAGER (COLLABORATOR) / 
POPSWORLDWIDE FOR POPS KIDS APP 
(December 2018 – Now) 
POPS Kids App is a new business unit in POPSWORLDWIDE with a one 
mission “Creating an entertainment-education platform for kids under parental 
control”.  
• 
Website: https://popskids.tv/ 
• 
Platform: Android, iOS, SmartTV 
Top partner on POPS Kids App: Samsung, LG, Zeasn, Smartbox, 
Mobifone, Viettel, VUS… 
Start by identifying the enterprise's real problems, find breakthroughs, and 
resolve single issues before trying to cover all areas to meet target of year:  
• 
Product improvement (website, application, collecting and tracking 
right data results) 
• 
Marketing plan for online and offline activities to acquire maximize 
user. 
• 
Track conversion rates and making improvements to the website, 
app. 
• 
Utilize a range of techniques including paid search, SEO and 
PPC. 
• 
Review new technologies and keep the company at the forefront 
of developments in digital marketing. 
• 
Work closely with content, business team to create partnership 
plan for leveraging sponsorship and making event. 
WORKING 4 YEAR AT IDM VIETNAM  
(Aug 2013 – Sept 2017)  
IDM Vietnam is a 360 digital marketing agency, offering clients listening services 
(IDM Analytics), strategic planning, creative digital production, social media, 
PPC advertising and SEO solutions. 
WEB STRATEGY TEAM LEADER, IDM VIETNAM 
(Sept 2015 - Sept 2017) 
Airlines: Vietnam Airlines, Cambodia Angkor Airlines, Jetstar,  
Education: Apollo, British Council, PSB,  
Banking: VIB, OCB, Vietcombank. 
Other: H2RB, VCSC, Prudential insurance, Manulife insurance. 
• 
Lead web strategy team to build effective digital-based marketing 
campaigns 
• 
Drive digital marketing performance across website and digital 
programs, including: SEM, SEO, display, mobile, video, social. 
• 
Be responsible for the metrics and KPI of all digital marketing 
channels.  
• 
Align campaign and content strategies with website user experience  
• 
Lead full stack web development team to manage, continuously 
upgrade and improve web design and performance  
• 
Lead ongoing projects of web team: agile development process and 
back end systems  
• 
Proactively identify digital technology innovation and growth 
opportunities 
• 
Have the experience to manage a lot of different campaigns at the 
same time, especially foreign markets such as UK, Australia, USA, 
Thailand, Malaysia… with the monthly media budget ranging from 
20.000 USD to 500.000 USD 
• 
Recruit, train and manage a team of five digital marketing 
professionals. 
SEARCH MARKETING SPECIALIST, IDM VIETNAM 
(Aug 2014 - Sept 2015) 
• 
Manage and optimize PPC campaigns (SEM, GDN, Coccoc …) Be 
responsible of technical website audit and link building for SEO 
projects. 
• 
Work with other teams (designer and production team) to 
optimize registration forms when needed. 
• 
Analyze users’ behaviors, identify registration’s process 
problems, then optimize to achieve better results. 
Notable Client: 
SEO: PNJ, Samsung, Vietnam Airlines, NEO Hormoviton, 
Techcombank… 
PPC: Vietnam Airlines, OCB, Prudential ... 
SEO EXECUTIVE, IDM VIETNAM 
(Aug 2013-Aug 2014) 
• 
Optimize onsite elements for SEO projects. 
• 
Analyze keywords and competitors to propose for customers  
• 
Create backlink strategies for link building campaigns  
• 
Consult writing techniques for SEO content, including but not 
limited to PR articles optimization. 
• 
Achieve KPI commitments for all campaigns. 
CO-FOUNDER, HOMESHOOT STUDIO  
(May 2017 - Sept 2018) 
The real meaning behind our name Homeshoot is that we would like to provide 
our dear customers with the warm and genuine feeling of your own home in all 
shootings. Whenever you choose to have your photos taken, in our studio or at 
the specific location of your choice, we will not only treat you as our customers, 
but also as our family’s members with love, care and respect. That’s why almost 
all customers come back to us for other special events in their life. 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
